ArticleTitle.sentence: Clone pAT 133 identifies a gene that encodes another human member of a class of growth factor-induced genes with almost identical zinc-finger domains.

event.clue: Clone pAT 133 identifies a gene that encodes another human member of a class of growth factor-induced genes with almost identical zinc-finger domains.

AbstractText.sentence: We report the structure and regulation of a gene represented by clone pAT 133, which is induced upon transition from a resting state (G0) through the early phase of the cell cycle (G1).

event.clue: We report the structure and regulation of a gene represented by clone pAT 133, which is induced upon transition from a resting state (G0) through the early phase of the cell cycle (G1).
We report the structure and regulation of a gene represented by clone pAT 133, which is induced upon transition from a resting state (G0) through the early phase of the cell cycle (G1).

AbstractText.sentence: The pAT 133 gene is immediately induced, with FOS-like kinetics, in human T cells and in fibroblasts.

event.clue: The pAT 133 gene is immediately induced, with FOS-like kinetics, in human T cells and in fibroblasts.
The pAT 133 gene is immediately induced, with FOS-like kinetics, in human T cells and in fibroblasts.

AbstractText.sentence: Primary structure analysis showed that the encoded protein contains three tandem zinc-finger sequences of the type Cys2-Xaa12-His2.

This zinc-finger region, which is thought to bind DNA in a sequence-specific manner, is similar (greater than 80% on the amino acid level) to two previously described transcription factors pAT 225/EGR1 and pAT 591/EGR2.

event.clue: This zinc-finger region, which is thought to bind DNA in a sequence-specific manner, is similar (greater than 80% on the amino acid level) to two previously described transcription factors pAT 225/EGR1 and pAT 591/EGR2.

AbstractText.sentence: Except for the conserved zinc-finger domains, the amino acid sequences of the three proteins are distinct.
This structural similarity suggests that the pAT 133 gene encodes a transcription factor with a specific biological function.
Comparing the regulation of these related zinc-finger-encoding genes showed coordinate induction upon mitogenic stimulation of resting T lymphocytes and of resting fibroblasts.

event.clue: Comparing the regulation of these related zinc-finger-encoding genes showed coordinate induction upon mitogenic stimulation of resting T lymphocytes and of resting fibroblasts.
Comparing the regulation of these related zinc-finger-encoding genes showed coordinate induction upon mitogenic stimulation of resting T lymphocytes and of resting fibroblasts.

AbstractText.sentence: However, upon transition from a proliferating (G1) to a resting state of the cell cycle the three genes were differently regulated.

event.clue: However, upon transition from a proliferating (G1) to a resting state of the cell cycle the three genes were differently regulated.

AbstractText.sentence: In human histiocytic U937 cells mRNA of clone pAT 133 was constitutively expressed, whereas mRNA of pAT 225/EGR1 was induced upon induction of terminal differentiation.

event.clue: In human histiocytic U937 cells mRNA of clone pAT 133 was constitutively expressed, whereas mRNA of pAT 225/EGR1 was induced upon induction of terminal differentiation.

AbstractText.sentence: In contrast mRNA representing pAT 591/EGR2 was not expressed in these cells.

event.clue: In contrast mRNA representing pAT 591/EGR2 was not expressed in these cells.

AbstractText.sentence: This difference in gene regulation suggests distinct biological roles in the control of cell proliferation for the respective proteins.

event.clue: This difference in gene regulation suggests distinct biological roles in the control of cell proliferation for the respective proteins.
